title: FlowMap

version.description: A version number in MAJOR.MINOR.PATCH format where the MINOR and PATCH fields are optional and the fields may have leading zeros (so 01.00.00 is the same as 1.0.0 or 1).

lastChange.description: The timestamp when the entity was changed the last time.

source.description: The reference (id, name, description) of the source flow list.

target.description: The reference (id, name, description) of the target flow list.

mappings.description: A list of flow mappings from flows in a source flow list to flows in a target flow list.

description: A crosswalk of flows from a source flow list to a target flow list.
